name: AHAAN FOUNDATION MUMBAI

address: 716, Ecstasy Commercial, J S D  Road,

briefDescription: Ahaan Foundation is located in Mumbai, Maharashtra.Ahaan Foundation is a registered trust aimed at mobilizing and empowering people towardsself-enhancement transition and evolution. We work towards sensitizing people towards social issues impacting their lives to bring about a change through collective action. In this digital era, it is essential to equip children and adults with online safety, ‘Responsible Netism’ is a unique project initiated by AHaan Foundation that aspires towards building cyber safe world in order to protect children and adults from digital distress. The team has successfully educated over 8 lakh students and adults on cyber wellness thus making then Responsible Netizens.

address: A-303, Pawan Putra Apartments, Plot No. 282, Charkop, Sector – 5,  Kandivali West
